plays.text: Penalty to Michal Rozsival 2 minutes for Holding Stu Barnes

Penalty to Miroslav Satan 2 minutes for High Sticking Janne Laukkanen
Penalty to Janne Laukkanen 2 minutes for Holding Miroslav Satan
Penalty to Stu Barnes 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)

Goal scored by Ian Moran assisted by Wayne Primeau and Darius Kasparaitis
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for Roughing Erik Rasmussen
Penalty to Michal Rozsival 2 minutes for Roughing J.P. Dumont
Penalty to Vaclav Varada 2 minutes for Tripping Darius Kasparaitis
Goal scored by Jan Hrdina assisted by Aleksey Morozov and Michal Rozsival
Penalty to J.P. Dumont 2 minutes for Roughing Ian Moran
Penalty to Ian Moran 2 minutes for Roughing J.P. Dumont
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference Martin Biron
Goal scored by Kris Beech assisted by Michal Rozsival and Billy Tibbetts
Penalty to Milan Kraft 2 minutes for High Sticking Jay McKee
